10092: 希儿能为她认知到的物体永久赋予量子属性。
ゼーレは認知した物体に対して、永久に量子属性を与えられるの。

Seele can permanently inscribe Quantum Properties on things she sees.
Seele can permanently assign quantum properties to objects she perceives.
Seele can give permanent quantum attributes to recognized objects.
希儿不在，这里的监视设备也关闭了，现在只有我和你。
当人はここに居ないし、この辺りの監視デバイスはシャットダウンしてあるわ。今、ここにいるのは私とあなただけよ。
당사자는 여기 없고, 이 주변의 감시 장치는 셧다운해 놓았어. 지금, 여기에 있는 건 나와 너뿐이야.
Seele’s not here, and the surveillance equipment got turned off. Now it’s just you and me.

我现在就展示给你看，什么是量子属性。
それじゃあ……量子属性とは何か見せてあげましょう。

I will now show you what quantum properties are.
Let me show you what the ...... quantum attribute is then.
伊瑟琳掏出一颗黄铜子弹，放在桌子上。那是之前布洛妮娅射向梅琳的子弹。然后她用支架固定了一个喷漆罐，朝子弹所在的位置自动喷红漆。这样一来，子弹一面会被喷上红色，子弹遮挡的桌面不会被喷上红色。
イザーリンは真鍮製の銃弾を1つ取り出しテーブルの上に置いた。それはブローニャがメリンに撃った銃弾だった。そして、スプレー缶をスタンドに固定し、銃弾の位置に向けて赤い塗料を噴射した。すると銃弾の片側は赤く染まったが、当然、銃弾に遮られていたテーブルの表面は赤く染まらなかった。
이자린은 황동제 탄환 하나를 꺼내어 테이블 위에 올려놓았다. 그것은 브로냐가 메린에게 쏜 탄환이었다. 그리고 스프레이 캔을 스탠드에 고정시킨 후, 탄환의 방향으로 빨간 페인트를 분사했다. 그러자 탄환의 한쪽은 빨갛게 물들었지만, 당연히 탄환에 가려져 있던 테이블 표면은 빨갛게 물들지 않았다.

Yiserin pulled out a brass bullet and placed it on the table. That was the bullet that Bronya shot at Merlin beforehand. Then she fixed a spray paint can with a bracket where it'd automatically spray red pain at the place where the bullet is positioned. This way, one side of the bullet will be sprayed red, and the desk covered by the bullet won't be painted red.

Estherine pulled out a brass bullet and placed it on the table. It was the bullet that Bronya had shot at Merlin earlier. Then she fixed a spray paint can with a stand and automatically sprayed red paint towards where the bullet was. This way, one side of the bullet would be sprayed red and the tabletop that the bullet was covering would not be sprayed red.

Estherine took out one of the brass bullets and placed it on the table. It was the bullet that Bronya had shot at Melin. He then secured the spray can to a stand and sprayed red paint toward the bullet's location. One side of the bullet was dyed red, but of course the surface of the table, which was blocked by the bullet, was not dyed red.
喷漆罐的呲呲声回荡在舱内，十几秒后——
スプレー缶のシューッという音がキャビンの中に響き渡る。十数秒後——
스프레이 캔의 쉬이익 하는 소리가 캐빈 안에 울려 퍼졌다. 십여 초 후——
The roaring sound of the spray paint can echoed in the cabin, and a dozen seconds later-
The bared sound of spray paint cans echoed through the cabin, and ten seconds later--
The whooshing sound of spray cans echoes through the cabin. A dozen or so seconds later--
伊瑟琳关闭喷漆罐，拿走一面红色的子弹，只见被它遮挡的桌面也和周围一样，被喷上了红色。
イザーリンはスプレーのスイッチを切り、片側が赤くなった銃弾を手に取った。すると銃弾で遮られていたはずのテーブルの表面も、周囲と同じように赤く染められていた。
이자린은 스프레이의 스위치를 끄고, 한쪽이 빨갛게 변한 탄환을 집어들었다. 그러자 탄환에 가려져 있던 테이블 표면도 주변과 마찬가지로 빨갛게 물들어 있었다.
Yiserin turned off the spray paint can and took away the bullet which was red on one side, only to see that the table covered by it was also sprayed with red, as was the surrounding area.
Estherine closes the spray paint can and takes away one side of the red bullet, only to see that the tabletop covered by it has been sprayed with the same red color as the surrounding area.

Estherine turned off the sprayer and picked up a bullet that had turned red on one side. Then the surface of the table, which should have been blocked by the bullet, was also dyed red like its surroundings.
这颗子弹经由希儿的能力，转化为了量子子弹。当有观察者的时候，它会坍缩为一个确定值。也就是我们平时生活经验中的样子。
この銃弾はゼーレの能力によって量子銃弾に変化したの。観察者がいるときは、確定した値に収束する。つまり、私たちが日常生活で目にする姿よ。
이 탄환은 제레의 능력으로 인해 양자 탄환으로 변한 거야. 관찰자가 있을 때는 확정된 값으로 수렴해. 즉, 우리가 일상에서 보는 모습이지.
This bullet was transformed into a quantum bullet via Seele's ability. When there is an observer, it collapses to a definite value. That is, the way it is in our normal life experience.
This bullet is transformed into a quantum bullet via Seele's ability. When there is an observer, it collapses to a definite value. Which is what it looks like in our normal life experience.
This bullet was transformed into a quantum bullet by Seele's ability. When an observer is present, it converges to a definite value. In other words, it's what we see in our everyday lives.
当没有观察者的时候，它就是一团概率云，根据概率处在一定范围中的任意位置。它没有消失，但你可以认为它消失了。
しかし、観察者がいない場合、それは電子雲となり、一定の範囲内の任意の位置に一定確率で存在する。消えたわけではないけれど、消えたと見なすこともできるわ。
하지만 관찰자가 없을 경우, 그것은 전자 구름이 되어 일정 범위 내에서 임의의 위치에 일정 확률로 존재하게 돼. 사라진 건 아니지만, 사라졌다고 볼 수도 있는 거야.
When there is no observer, it’s a probability cloud, in any position in a certain range according to the probability. It doesn't actually disappear, but you can think of it as disappearing.
When there's no observer, it's a probability cloud that's in any position in a certain range according to probability. It doesn't disappear, but you can assume it does.

But in the absence of an observer, it becomes an electronic cloud, existing at any given location within a certain range with a certain probability. It doesn't disappear, but it could be considered gone.
ゼーレちゃんはどうしてそんなことができるんですか？
제레 쨩은 어떻게 그런 게 가능한 거죠?
How can you do that, Seele?
そうだと思い込むことによって、それが現実になるということでしょうか？
그렇게 믿음으로써, 그것이 현실이 된다는 말씀이신가요?
Think that it is, and it is?
Think it is, and it is?
By assuming it to be so, does that make it a reality?
但认知是一个极难描述的过程。你想，人眼怎么看得清出膛的子弹？但知道有一颗子弹被射出，对子弹位置的认知就大概成立，而且那是朝夕相处的布洛妮娅常用的子弹，认知就更准确了。
でも、認知は説明が非常に難しいプロセスなの。例えば、発射される銃弾を人間の目ではっきり見ることなんてできないでしょう？でも、発射されたことを知るだけで、銃弾の位置に関する認知は概ね成り立つの。しかも、それがいつも一緒にいるブローニャがよく使う銃弾なら、認知はより正確になるわ。
하지만 인지는 설명하기 매우 어려운 과정이야. 예를 들어, 발사되는 총알을 인간의 눈으로 뚜렷이 볼 수는 없지? 하지만 발사되었다는 걸 아는 것만으로, 총알의 위치에 대한 인지는 대개 성립하는 거야. 게다가, 그것이 항상 함께 있는 브로냐가 자주 쓰는 총알이라면, 인지는 더 정확해지지.

But cognition is an extremely difficult process to describe. How do you think the human eye can see a fired bullet? But knowing that a bullet was fired, the cognition of the bullet's location is probably established, and that it was a bullet commonly used by Bronya, who spent a lot of time with her, the cognition became more accurate.

But cognition is an extremely difficult process to describe. Think about it, how can the human eye see a discharged bullet? But knowing that a bullet was fired, the perception of the bullet's location probably holds true, and the fact that it was a bullet commonly used by Bronya, who spends a lot of time together, makes the perception even more accurate.

But cognition is a very difficult process to explain. For example, it is impossible for the human eye to clearly see a bullet being fired, is it not? But knowing that a bullet has been fired is all that is needed to make cognition about the bullet's location generally valid. And if it is a bullet that Bronya, who is always with us, often uses, the perception becomes more accurate.
とても恐ろしいですね……。
この能力の真価はこんなものじゃないわ。
이 능력의 진가는 이 정도가 아니야.
That’s not even the scariest part.
And that's not even the worst of it.
This isn't the true value of this ability.
当时有好几人在现场，监视器也都开着，那颗子弹依然变为了概率云，重新坍缩的位置在它的飞行轨道以外。
当時、その場には何人もいて、監視カメラも動作していたのに、銃弾は電子雲となり、銃弾の弾道から外れた場所で再び収束したのよ。
당시, 그 자리에는 여러 사람이 있었고, 감시 카메라도 작동 중이었는데, 총알은 전자구름이 되어, 총알의 탄도에서 벗어난 곳에서 다시 수렴했어.
In that room were 7 people and a bunch of surveillance, yet the bullet still collapsed into a probability cloud and recollapsed beyond its flight path.
Several people were there, monitors were on, and the bullet still turned into a probability cloud, recollapsing outside of its flight path.
There were a number of people there at the time, and the surveillance cameras were working, yet the bullets turned into an electronic cloud that converged again just off the bullet's trajectory.
过去希儿曾借这个能力出现在墙壁的另一侧，说明她自己已经是量子物体了。可她之所以没成为概率云，我认为主要靠她对自我的观察，但自我观察到底是什么，怎么进行……她和我们都无从描述。
以前、ゼーレはこの能力を使って壁の反対側に現われたことがあるわ。それは彼女自身が量子物体であることを意味していて、彼女が電子雲にならなかったのは、彼女の自己観察によるものだと推測しているわ。ただ、自己観察が一体何であるのか、どうやって行うのかは……彼女も私たちも説明できないの。
이전에, 제레는 이 능력을 사용해 벽 반대쪽에 나타난 적이 있어. 그것은 그녀 자신이 양자 물체라는 것을 의미하고, 그녀가 전자구름이 되지 않은 것은 그녀의 자기 관찰 때문이라고 추측하고 있어. 다만, 자기 관찰이 대체 무엇인지, 어떻게 수행하는지는…… 그녀도 우리도 설명할 수 없어.

In the past Seele had used this ability to walk through walls, indicating that she herself was already a quantum object. But the reason she didn't become a probability cloud, I think, depends mainly on her observation of self, but what exactly self observation is and how it is done... Neither she nor we can describe it.

In the past Seele has lent this ability to appear on the other side of the wall, suggesting that she herself is already a quantum object. But the reason she hasn't become a probability cloud is, I think, largely dependent on her observation of her self, but what exactly self-observation is and how it is carried out ...... neither she nor we have any way of describing it.

I've seen Seele use this ability to appear on the other side of the wall before. I assume that means she is a quantum object herself, and that the reason she didn't turn into an electronic cloud is due to her self-observation. However, neither she nor we can explain what self-observation is or how she does it .......
这些现象说明，希儿对外界和自我的观察，凌驾于自然界其他一切观察效应，甚至能实现定点坍缩……她在决定物质世界如何运行啊！
これらの現象から、ゼーレは外界と自分自身に対する観察によって、自然界の他のあらゆる観察効果を凌駕し、さらには特定の場所で収束することすらできる……彼女は物質世界の動きを決められるのよ！
이러한 현상으로부터, 제레는 외계와 자기 자신에 대한 관찰을 통해, 자연계의 다른 모든 관찰 효과를 능가하고, 나아가 특정한 장소에서 수렴하기까지 할 수 있어…… 그녀는 물질 세계의 움직임을 결정할 수 있는 거야!

These phenomena show that Seele's observation of the outside world and self overrides all other observational effects in nature, and can even achieve fixed-point collapse... She can decide how the material world works!
